title: Region defined by y=1/SQRTx  part - a

content.description: Let R be the region in the first quadrant under the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>x</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39DB@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for 4 ≤ x ≤ 9.
content.question: Find the area of R.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
